attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's not currently illegal for me to buy a car, open a bank account or take out a loan or mortgage in YOUR name.  

Yes, YOU.

There's a lot if fuss about ID cards helping to prevent identity theft/fraud, but it's not actually illegal right now.

I think this should change, and I think a lot of other people will too.

Yours,

Matt
